import React from "react"; import { useTranslation } from "react-i18next"; import "../i18n"; import "./IntroPage.scss"; import { GetStaerted } from "../get-started-button/GetStaerted"; import { BrowserRouter as Router, Switch, Route, Link } from "react-router-dom"; export const IntoPage = () => { const { t, i18n } = useTranslation(); return (
{t("psy-comfort-org-header")}
{t("psy-comfort-org-subheader")}
70% {t("team-engagement")}
12x {t("team-leader-engagement")}
{t("higher-engagment-header")}
{t("higher-engagment-subheader")}
24% {t("turnover")}
17% {t("productivity")}
41% {t("absenteeism")}
); };
